title: How to Make a Glow in the Dark Light Switch Plate

steps.headline: Take your switch plate off using a flat-head screwdriver.
Spray or brush paint the plate with white flat primer paint.
Paint on the glow paint in the color you wish to use.
steps.description: You can decorate with two colors.

steps.headline: Allow to dry and spray the plate with a clear sealer.

text: Take your switch plate off using a flat-head screwdriver.  Spray or brush paint the plate with white flat primer paint.  Paint on the glow paint in the color you wish to use. You can decorate with two colors. Allow to dry and spray the plate with a clear sealer.  Replace the plate.
